description: Canada is seeking offers ... equipement lourd, including cutting edges, nuts & bolts, washers, to The Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title: Heavy Equipment Replacement of Cutting Edges

* French Title: W0113-23CS28 Remplacement des tranchants d'équipement lourd

## Reference Number and Solicitation Number:

WS4332227241-Doc4332261766 and WS4332227241

## Tender Status and Closing Date:

The tender announcement has expired and closed on January 5th, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

## Procurement Details:

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Request for Offer)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Requirements and Scope of Work:

The Department of National Defence is seeking offers from qualified suppliers to provide heavy equipment replacement parts, including cutting edges, nuts & bolts, washers, and other related components.

## Evaluation Criteria:

The tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the Offerors.

## Contract Details:

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contact Information:

For any questions or clarification regarding the tender, please contact:
Jeffrey Smallwood, SPAC/PSPC, at (il-le-lui / he-him-his)
jeffrey.smallwood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

---

### References
According to the Government of Canada's tendering process, the below UNSPSC classification corresponds to the goods or services being requested.

* UNSPSC: 23000000
* UNSPSC Description (English): Industrial Manufacturing and Processing Machinery and Accessories
* UNSPSC Description (French): Machines et accessoires pour la transformation et la fabrication industrielle

Note: The classificiation details and UNSPSC coding are included for reference only and do not imply that the classification was qualitatively assessed and verified for accuracy by this rewritten announcement. 

I looked up the UNSPSC code and classification you mentioned, here they are.

**23000000  - *Industrial Manufacturing and Processing Machinery and Accessories*
